The Hag mutters some ancient words and suddenly a spiritual shield materialises and protects the friendly regiments from damage.
Sheer, undiluted spite sharpens the dead eye further.
Imbued with the essence of the God of Death, the Nehekharans' blades strike with supernatural force to harvest souls for Djaf.
The spellcaster unleashes the beast within, using its fury to transform allies into bestial forms.
The targets of this spell are driven to go right for the 'hurty bitz' or sneak up on opponents at unexpected angles.
Trees live for thousands of years and have very long memories. When called to fight, centuries of pent-up wrath are unleashed.
The caster weaves a confounding fog that numbs and deludes enemies, causing them to stumble and stagger.
A vile wave indeed, the creeping things that nest in the decaying undergrowth swarm all over the foe.
Sharp icicles spring from the mage's hand in the direction of the target, causing multiple wounds as they pierce and impale their targets.
The caster weaves a confounding fog that numbs and deludes enemies, causing them to stumble and stagger.
